Init.name: Init
Init.sender:
{
  state.floors = 10
  state.current_floor = 0
  state.max_passengers = 8
  state.scheduled_maintenance_interval = 2000
  state.call_rate = 0.1
  state.ride_rate = 0.11
  state.maintenance_due = false
  state.stats = {
    calls: 0,
    calls_since_maintenance: 0,
    rides: 0,
    rides_since_maintenance: 0
  }

  var now = dayjs()
  console.log(now)

  next('Idle')
}

Idle.name: Idle

Maintenance.name: Maintenance

On_Call.name: On_Call

On_Ride.name: On_Ride
